#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int divi[200002];
bool isprime[100000];
void init()
{int i,j;
    for(i=2;i<=1000;i++)
    if(isprime[i]==0)
    for(j=i*i;j<=100000;j+=i)
    isprime[j]=1;
}
main()
{int t,i,a,b,j;
    cin>>t;
init();
while(t--)
{
    cin>>a>>b;
    for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
    divi[i-a]=0;
    for(i=1;i*i<=b;i++)
    {int sq=i*i;
        for(j=((a-1)/i+1)*i;j<=b;j+=i)
        {if(j<sq)
        continue;
        if(j==sq)
        divi[j-a]+=1;
        else
        divi[j-a]+=2;
    }
    }int c=0;
    for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
    if(isprime[divi[i-a]]==0)
    c++;
    cout<<c<<endl;
}

}
